name: The Last Hero
description:
The city needs your help!

The game The Last Hero is simulation game and a true example of what our lives would look like with such a character.

As the main here who has the superpower to fly and feel someone's need from a distance, your mission will be differents, starting from saving a cat, to picking a doctor and transporting him to the victim in record time, which an ambulance could not have done.

What scientific progress that would be! Until then, let's admire this in the game. Run, hero, someone needs you!

Game Features :
- Hero with superpowers
- 10 levels
- Extreme situations
- Limited time
